General.Name: Amara Raja Batteries Limited
General.Description: Amara Raja Batteries Limited manufactures and sells lead-acid storage batteries for industrial and automotive applications in India. The company also provides installation, commissioning, and maintenance services. It sells its batteries under the Amaron, PowerZone, Power Stack, AmaronVolt, and Quanta brands. The company exports its products to various countries in the Indian Ocean Rim. It supplies its batteries to various customer groups, such as telecom, railways, solar, power control, and UPS; and automobile OEMs, replacement markets, and private label customers. Amara Raja Batteries Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
